title: Anyone else feel like Morgana fell off?
body: Because it feels like Morgana fell off.  She isn't a good pick anywhere.   Not support nor Mid.  God, especially not mid.

replies.body: Eh, she feels like she's back to being primarily a counterpick.  She has a handful of really abusive mid matchups still, and she's still good at peeling some of the heavy all-in supports.  However, you are right that with a kit like hers she's getting slowly left behind.
I haven't played Morg in awhile, I'll test it out in 5.14 to see whats up with it.

Well, maybe a little, but she won't really fall off until they nerf her Q, which will likely be never :P

Although there's also the chance that everyone eventually has a dash of some sort which could also make her pretty sad.
